alert.note: Alert for Dawson, McCone, Prairie, Richland, Wibaux Counties; Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:29AM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY NORTHWEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 120 AND 122... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 120 and 122. * WIND...Northwest 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent north of the Missouri River and as low as 25 percent to the south. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Dawson, McCone, Prairie, Richland, Wibaux Counties; Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties
